title: Canal & Waterway Quiz
description: Navigate through questions about the world's most famous canals and waterways, from ancient irrigation to modern shipping routes.

questions.question: The Panama Canal connects the Atlantic Ocean to which other ocean?
The Suez Canal, one of the world's most important shipping routes, connects the Mediterranean Sea to which body of water?
Venice, Italy, is famous for its canals. What is the main waterway running through the city called?
The Erie Canal, completed in 1825, connects the Great Lakes to which river in New York State?
The Amsterdam Canal Ring, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, was largely constructed during which century?
The Corinth Canal in Greece cuts through a narrow isthmus to connect which two bodies of water?
options: Gulf of Corinth and Saronic Gulf
